INVESTIGATION:
Rule Code & CCI Rule 400.4126
Section The licensee shall have a sufficient number of administrative,
Description supervisory, social service, direct care, and other staff on duty to
perform the prescribed functions required by these administrative rules
and in the agency’s program statement and to provide for the continual
needs, protection and supervision of residents.
Violation Potential Rule or Statute Violation
Type
2

Allegation Youth A stated he woke up with his rear end feeling funny and a “wad”
in his pants. Youth A stated he was handcuffed with his feet tied up and
sedated when he was raped on 12/14/2022.
Investigation Complainant
Complainant was interviewed on 12/15/2022 by telephone.
Complainant stated Youth A has auditory and visual hallucinations and
refuses his medication. Complainant stated Youth A refused to provide
staff name and details of the alleged sexual assault.
Youth A
Another Department of Health and Human Service worker contacted
law enforcement on 12/15/2022 regarding Youth A’s allegation of
sexual assault. Law enforcement requested interviews not occur until
Youth A was stable and his statement was taken by law enforcement. I
interviewed Youth A face to face on 01/12/2023 at Oakland County
Children Village. Youth A stated he was placed at Oakland County
Children Village on 11/23/2022. Youth A said, “Conditions are good, but
you’re treated like a kid” in reference to his placement. Youth A stated
he was first placed in Room 4, moved to Room A and now in Room 15
with all the rooms being on J Down unit for a single occupant. Youth A
stated there was an incident on 12/14/2022 in Room A. Youth A stated
he woke up in bed on the concrete bedframe and found a “wad”
(semen) on his buttocks. Youth A stated he was confused how this
happened because he did not dream that night. Youth A stated he saw
a supervisor with angel wings on his forearms outside of his room and
asked him what happened. Youth A stated the supervisor did not
respond and he does not know the supervisor’s name. Youth A stated
he also found a “wad” near his groin on two separate occasions
between 12/10/2022 and 12/13/2022 when he woke up. Youth A stated
he did not dream or masturbate during these incidents. Youth A stated
he slept with his mattress on the ground in front of his door during these
incidents and recalled a male staff opening the door from the hallway
and the door bumping into his mattress on the ground, but he did not
wake up enough to see who it was. Youth A stated he does not take
medication because he does not need it. Multiple times in the interview
Youth A said, “I put on an act. Show of crazy. I’ve done six years of
prison research.” Youth A stated he feels safe at Oakland County
Children Village, but his guard is never down. Youth A stated he feels
safe because the other residents are calm and a gay resident was
discharged.
Supervisor 1
Supervisor 1 was interviewed face to face on 01/12/2023 at Oakland
County Children Village. Supervisor 1 was interviewed because he has
tattoos of wings on both his forearms. Supervisor 1 did not recall any
4

specific interaction with Youth A. Supervisor 1 stated he has never
entered Youth A’s bedroom. Supervisor 1 stated he would have another
staff present as a witness if he were to enter Youth A’s bedroom.
Incident report
Administrator 1 stated there are no incident reports involving Youth A
and Supervisor 1.
Video Reviewed
Oakland County Children’s Village did not find video footage of a male
staff entering or trying to enter Youth A’s bedroom on 12/14/2022.
Administrator 1 stated Oakland County Children’s Village provided law
enforcement with a copy of the video for their investigation. Video
footage for 12/10/2022 to 12/13/2022 was not previously requested and
is no longer available.
Tour Observation
I viewed Room A on J Down on 01/12/2023. Room A is designated for
suicide precaution or youth with extra monitoring needs. Room A is
located next to the staff office. Room A has the standard window in the
door, but has an additional window in a shared wall with the staff office.
Documents Reviewed
Supervisor 1’s personnel file was reviewed on 01/12/2023. Supervisor 1
was hired on 03/03/2014. Supervisor 1 does not have a discipline
history.
Another Department of Health and Human Service agency completed
an investigation without finding.
Analysis Youth A did not state in his interview that he was handcuffed with his
feet tied up and sedated and raped on 12/14/2022 at Oakland County
Children’s Village. Youth A stated he was confused when he woke up
with a “wad” on his buttocks on 12/14/2022 and asked a supervisor with
angel wings tattoos on his forearms what happened. Supervisor 1 has
wing tattoos on his forearms and denied entering Youth A’s bedroom.
Video footage does not show Supervisor 1 in Youth A’s bedroom on
12/14/2022. Youth A was also confused when he found a “wad” on two
separate occasions between 12/10/2022 to 12/13/2022 near his groin
when he woke up. Youth A stated a male staff was outside of his room
and opened the door and bumped his mattress on the ground in front of
the door, but he was not awake enough to identify the staff. Youth A
stated he did not dream or masturbate and is confused how a “wad”
occurred in these three incidents. It is not found that staff had sexual
contact with Youth A between 12/10/2022 to 12/14/2022. This
investigation will be reopened if additional information is received.
